GENERIC_SIGNIN_ERROR_MESSAGE: Either the username or password is incorrect
UNAUTHORIZED_SIGNIN_ERROR_MESSAGE: Either the username or password is incorrect
VERIFICATION_MESSAGE: A verification code  has been sent to your mobile phone at {phoneNumber}
BIOMETRIC_MESSAGE_OPT_IN: Motiv8 mobile app uses Biometric authentication on your device for extra security. No passwords!
BIOMETRIC_MESSAGE_OPT_OUT: If you opt out of Biometric authentication, you will have the option of signing in with a code everytime you use the Motiv8 mobile app. Click the button below to opt out.
BIOMETRIC_MESSAGE_UNAVAILABLE: Your device does not support Biometric authentication. You will have to sign in using a code everytime you use the Motiv8 mobile app.
